snippet: The Seattle Police Department has begun 51 hyper-local Twitter accounts to provide crime reports.
abstract: Seattle Police Dept begins Tweets-by-beat, project featuring 51 hyper-local Twitter accounts that allows residents to know in almost real time about many of the large and small transgressions, crises and emergencies in their neighborhoods; Twitter program is 1 of 20 incentives announced in 2012 by Mayor Mike McGinn to increase public awareness.
lead_paragraph: The Seattle Police Department has begun 51 hyper-local Twitter accounts to provide crime reports.

headline.seo: Seattle Police Department Uses Twitter to Report Crime
headline.print_headline: Hey, @SeattlePD: What’s Going On Near Me?
